methods: abstract DOMLocator getLocation() The location of the error.
abstract String getMessage() An implementation specific string describing the error that occurred.
abstract Object getRelatedData() The related DOMError.type dependent data if any.
abstract Object getRelatedException() The related platform dependent exception if any.
abstract short getSeverity() The severity of the error, either SEVERITY_WARNING, SEVERITY_ERROR, or SEVERITY_FATAL_ERROR.
abstract String getType() A DOMString indicating which related data is expected in relatedData.
constants: short SEVERITY_ERROR The severity of the error described by the DOMError is error.
short SEVERITY_FATAL_ERROR The severity of the error described by the DOMError is fatal error.
short SEVERITY_WARNING The severity of the error described by the DOMError is warning.
